attributes.action: subsidise rail travel throughout the UK and therefore address the issue of climate change.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With soaring rail prices, it becomes more cost effective to take short haul plane flights. It is very important, given the threat of climate change, that the government supports more environmentally friendly transport systems. Rail prices are set to increase by 30% by 2015.
